name: Drill Game
description:
My first project working with Unity.  This is a clone/knock-off of an old flash game called Motherload.  

The game is currently unfinished but I'm hoping to continue work and add more features like a small story and additional minerals.  

It should work with a controller or keyboard.  

The controls are:

W,A,S,D - Movement

Spacebar - Start/Accept

Down to drill, up to fly.  

Drive into the different items to interact with them.
